newsitem.title: USA: Shareholders to sell more Infinity Financial stock.
newsitem.headline: Shareholders to sell more Infinity Financial stock.

text.p: Shareholders of Infinity Financial Technology Inc have increased the number of shares they will sell in the upcoming initial public offering of the company, according to a regulatory filing.
The shareholders will shed 500,000 shares in the offering, bringing the total number of shares on offer to 2.5 million.
Previously, the offering was to total 2.35 million shares, with two million to be offered by the company and 350,000 to be offered by shareholders.
The shares are expected to price in a range of $13 to $15 each. Goldman Sachs is the lead underwriter.
Infinity Financial has proposed to trade on the Nasdaq under the symbol "INFN."
